name: Chronac
detailed_description:
Chronac is a fast paced action-platformer with lots of acrobatics, an arsenal of futuristic carnage, and two very determined robots.

Set in a robot manufacturing facility in 2053, it runs tests on its robots to conclude which one is the perfect design. Fight to the last bit of metal in a variety of areas where the only way to win is to outwit your opponent.

You can choose test yourself in 4 game modes :
  • Territory
    • You only win after getting through your opponents grounds.
      Get defeated in a battle and you will lose the area.
      Winning or losing a single battle does not decide the game.
  • Deathmatch
    • Fight with a limited amount of lives and random drops.
  • Search and Deliver
    • Try to find a set number of suitcases and deliver them before your opponent does.
  • Capture the Radio
    • A radio station randomly appears around the map. Capture and secure it or destroy the radio captured by your opponent

Or you can choose to leave the program and try to escape this vast facility with a security system that seems to know your every move, your every decision. Can you beat the system that created you ? Be prepared to question the reality that is set out for you in your mission to find answers.

Features :
  • Online, Lan or Split-Screen multiplayer
  • Challenging yet rewarding Single Player experience
  • Over 5 weapons and 2 different bots to aid you.
  • Custom multiplayer games with every tweak imaginable including :
    • Custom player health, damage and weapon rate of fire
    • Different map sizes for Territory mode
    • Selectable weapon pickups and banning weapons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1.4GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8-compatible graphics card with at least 32MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
